• #getreadytogrow The Solutions Engineering Operations team is seeking an Operations Analyst Intern who is eager to apply technical and analytical skills in the semiconductor industry.
• Are currently pursuing a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Data Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field.
• Candidates with alternative degrees will also be considered if they have relevant experience.
• Arm Internships require you to be enrolled in a higher education degree and be returning to your course after your internship/placement.
• Experienced Professionals Throughout your internship, you’ll work closely with mentors who will guide your technical learning and professional development.
• Working on interesting new projects with leaders in the field is exciting, but we also know how important it is to receive support.
• That's why throughout your internship, you can expect regular feedback and development opportunities, social activities to connect with your peers, an end of internship celebration, plus the opportunity to be *considered for future Graduate positions (*subject to performance).
• This internship is ideal for someone who is curious, detail-oriented, and excited to learn how data analysis, automation, and process optimization support world-class engineering teams.
